      default void Table.batch(List<? extends Row> actions, Object[] results)
      Method that does a batch call on Deletes, Gets, Puts, Increments, Appends, RowMutations.
      default <T> CompletableFuture<List<T>> AsyncTable.batchAll(List<? extends Row> actions)
      A simple version of batch.
      <R> void TableOverAsyncTable.batchCallback(List<? extends Row> actions, Object[] results, Batch.Callback<R> callback) 
      default <R> void Table.batchCallback(List<? extends Row> actions, Object[] results, Batch.Callback<R> callback)
      Deprecated. 
      since 3.0.0, will removed in 4.0.0. Please use the batch related methods in AsyncTable directly if you want to use callback. We reuse the callback for coprocessor here, and the problem is that for batch operation, the AsyncTable does not tell us the region, so in this method we need an extra locating after we get the result, which is not good.
      static String RetriesExhaustedWithDetailsException.getDesc(List<Throwable> exceptions, List<? extends Row> actions, List<String> hostnamePort)
